short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add context menu item to clap emoji current text selection and copy it to clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add👏right👏click👏option👏to👏turn👏any👏selected👏text👏like👏this👏and👏then👏copy👏it👏to👏the👏clipboard.
